title: Improve Quarkus bootstrap Maven workspace discovery
body:
### Description

The current default workspace discovery is based on processing raw POM models, discovering local parent modules and processing their modules. It has its limitations. For example it does not support Maven profiles or not discover all the modules in case of tricky POM hierarchy (e.g. parent POM referencing modules, whose parent POMs are different and/or not found in the current workspace). For these tricky cases there is `-Dquarkus.bootstrap.effective-model-builder` option that enables effective POM model building. The disadvantage of this option is it makes significantly slow down CI time for some projects (to be tested for each specific case).
This issue is about finding a more reliable approach that could be used by default.
